text: Michael P. Pratt (August 4, 1948 â€“ June 16, 2022) was an American basketball player and coach. He played for the Kentucky Colonels from 1970 until 1972. Pratt died on June 16, 2022 in Lexington, Kentucky from colon cancer at the age of 73.Former UK basketball player, radio analyst Mike Pratt dies at 73 ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:College basketball coaches Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Dayton, Ohio
